Nice Places is an app that let you discover places of historical, cultural and artistic interest close to you, offering a description of them to satisfy your curiosity.\nNot only, you will also have the opportunity to travel virtually and move along the peninsula, to cross itineraries, landscapes, cities and remote places, discovering what makes Italy, from this point of view, one of the richest country in the world.

In this version you can use two modes:\n• Places around you let you discover places of interest closest to you, you can turn on navigation to reach those places or read the description.\n• Explore with which you can view the list of all places divided by area.
Compared to the previous version lots of new places and description have been inserted. Every week more will be added!
Follow us on social network to support our project, to don\'t miss updates and to find out which places will be the next who will be added on Nice Places!
If you want to report a problem, un advice or have further information on the project you can send a message to our Facebook or Instagram accounts or send an e-mail to the following address.

Thank you for downloading Nice Places! This app let you discover places of historical, cultural and artistic interest close to you, offering a description of them to satisfy your curiosity.\nNot only, you will also have the opportunity to travel virtually and move along the peninsula, to cross itineraries, landscapes, cities and remote places, discovering what makes Italy, from this point of view, one of the richest country in the world.
To get started, allow your device to read your location and calculate which locations are closest and how far they are.
From the main menu select \"Places around you\". A map will be displayed with your position and the nearest places.
Touch the place you are interested in from the list at the bottom: it will be highlighted on the map.
Touch the marker with the photo displayed on the map to open the card with the details of the place.
Touching the button \"Start navigation\" you can open the navigator.
The app is retrieving your location…
New places are waiting for you!
The places shown on map are those whose distance (in kilometers as the crow flies from your position) is less or equal than the one indicated here.

When you use the function \"Places around you\" the app receives a location update every time the time interval (in seconds) indicated above elapses or the new position is located at a distance (in meters) greater than the one indicated above.\nSet these values to adjust the frequency of update of position and therefore of the list of places.
